attributes.action: lower the legal working age to 14 out of school hours and on weekends
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the legal age of work to be lowerd to 14 out of school hours and at weekends so that teenages and youg adults can make there own money, experience money management and so that they know how hard work can be. We believe that by doing this you will have to have a higher minimum wage to avoid them being exploited, however the postive benifits are endless. The teenages experience work, earn money and learn skills befor they are thrown into full time employment.
